knimeNode.name: Interaction Types Retriever
knimeNode.shortDescription: KNIME node to retrieve the different interaction types that are encoded for each pocket residue in the interaction fingerprint.

fullDescription.intro: KNIME node to retrieve the different interaction types that are encoded for each pocket residue in the interaction fingerprint. This node retrieves the different interaction types for each bit position of the interaction fingerprint (IFP) method and can, for example, be used in combination with the Interaction Fingerprint Decomposer to identify what kinase-ligand interactions are present in specific structures.

ports.outPort: Description of the different interactions types represented by the IFP bit positions. 7 bits are encoded for each binding pocket residue.
